website_summaries.verdict: This carpet powder can lift odors, but also tackles spot cleaning.
pros: Safe on wool as well as many other carpet fibers
Cleans carpets dry, without a shampooing machine or having to wait for extensive dry times
Works for area rugs as well as wall-to-wall carpeting
cons: For best results, you may need to buy a separate spray product to use with this powder

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Eight-pound bucket is the best value; this product is easy to apply, and no thirty-minute wait time before you vacuum. This has a nice "citrus" smell to it, it comes with a slotted-scoop to make application very easy. I used our car wash brush to move it into the carpet fibers. Also, I have a Rainbow vacuum cleaner, which has the water basin, which I believe helped in the cleaning process. I read a review that said it will ruin your vacuum cleaner? I think the key to using "Capture" is to let it dry completely. Vacuum a room, empty the canister, repeat. I will be purchasing more of this product! I highly recommend it. Linda W.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: and this is the best. Originally
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years. I've tried them all, and this is the best. Originally, it was recommended to my by the owner of a janitorial supply store. It's great on pet stains when used as directed with the special rug brush and the prep spray. When I moved to a new community, I couldn't find it anywhere locally and was very happy to be able to order this online. Just finished spot cleaning all the heavy traffic areas in my house. Completely finished and ready to walk on carpet in less than an hour. I will buy this product again.........and again.
customer_reviews.author: Anniebuddy

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job, but it'll destroy your vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: My new house's last residents apparently let their puppy relieve itself everywhere, including two big rugs. So I got this stuff -- don't forget to the spray stuff that it needs to work! -- and it did a great job. Unfortunately, the cleaning power is of a size that pretty much toasts just about any modern vacuum, so I guess it's Rug Doctor from now on. Despite the dead vacuum, it really DID do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Minasi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happier with this than my Bissell carpet cleaner. I spray a bit of Resolve on the carpet for tough spots, then follow directions and it works terrific! For best value, buy the 8 lb tub for the powder. You can buy the pre-treat spray separately as well. The kit comes with the pre-reat spray and a scrub brush to which you can attach a broom handle and a good stiff broom works just fine. I have a Shark vacuum and need to clean receptacle and sponge filters after after each floor. Way easier than the Bissell, no dry time required and the longer you leave it set on the carpets after brooming in the better it looks after vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: SStone

customer_reviews.title: It did not do anything
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product and the acompanying pre-treatment spray because my mother swears by this stuff. We have a well-worn white shag area rug that has seen plenty of traffic. We treated half the rug as directed with the pre-treatment spray and powder twice. You cannot tell the difference between the treated and untread parts of the rug. So ~$40 for the powder and ~$9 for the spray for absolutely no results.
customer_reviews.author: DaveAbdallah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for damp environments
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for years. We now live in a rainforest, so traditional carpet cleaning doesn't happen as often because they just won't dry. I use this every 6-8 weeks on the heavy traffic areas and about every 6-9 months for overall. It lifts the dirt right out. Light pleasant scent - no heavy chemicals. Can't say enough good about this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Scam - Doesn’t come out of the carpet
customer_reviews.text: For various reasons, I happen to have a floor cleaner and a wet dry vac. We need to clean our carpets then spray for fleas, so I wanted to try a powder cleaner so that we don’t get a wet carpet and a bigger flea problem. This had good reviews so I bought it with the activator and followed the instructions. The powder doesn’t come out of the carpet at all. Worse, anywhere the activator was sprayed, the powder clumped and won’t come up.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This powder in conjunction with the Capture spray took a stain out of my carpet - that I thought would ruin it. Purchase this and the spray and your carpet will be good as new, also great as a carpet refresher between professional cleanings. The company that installed our carpet recommended this brand and said never use any of the store purchased brands (Resolve) as it actually helps capture dirt and stains.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Been Using Capture Carpet Cleaner Over 10 Years...It's the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I've had great results using this dry carpet cleaner. It's important to do each step well. Vacuum first. Then for the misting I use Folex (also great for spot remover) which is available on Amazon:  . Then I sprinkle Capture over the misted area. I work it in thoroughly with an Oreck carpet buffer. Then it's ready to be vacuumed again removing all the Capture cleaner. My carpets come out looking like new! It's a little bit of work but saves a bunch over having it done.
customer_reviews.author: Frits tP

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Bissel carpet cleaner which does a great job however I was having some issues getting leftover cat Urine smells out of my carpet and couch . I had already treated the areas with an Enzyme which did work however there was still some leftover smell. This stuff did the trick . It also does a great job cleaning the carpets without the hassle of a wet carpet after. Use with the spray for tough stains and odors.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Clean without wet carpet
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product for years and find it is the best way to clean light colored carpets. It takes some effort to apply but is easy to vacuum up. We use it on large areas of carpet where there is heavy traffic. We follow the protocol of using the spray followed by the powder, which seems necessary for the best results. I bought it here because it is possible to get the 8 lb. container.
customer_reviews.author: Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Better than any liquid carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my carpets with my Oreck Orbital machine. I clean it quarterly since we all have terrible allergies. Helps so much and makes my carpets clean, fluffy and looking so good!! I have never tried doing it with a hand brush. It would seems very labor intensive to me. Best part is the carpet is dry and ready to use instantly!!
customer_reviews.author: Yuleidy Kern

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and powder never goes away!
customer_reviews.text: I applied this product as directed and am still vacuuming up white powder that is like chalk dust 4 months later. I have a super powerful Shark vacuum cleaner and yet it's still there getting my vacuum cleaner filters dirty! Also it did not remove the wet dog smell from the carpet, due to a very clean dog who sometimes walks through with rain or dew wet feet. The product had a slightly fresh smell when applied but that fresh scent quickly disappeared! It also becomes difficult to spray a large area of carpet, bending over and squeezing trigger over and over. I have tons left and probably won't use again.
customer_reviews.author: Tully

customer_reviews.title: country carpets and four dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve actually bought this product twice now and I am very happy with the results. I live in the country and so rug cleaning is a must. Especially when the original order putting cream carpets. Who puts cream carpets in a country home? Would not of been my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Deann

customer_reviews.title: Been Using for Years, Nothing Better!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Capture brand cleaners for years, ever since we had our first animals. No matter how many different products I have tried, no other products really can come close to the amazing ease and cleaning power of this. In combination with the Capture spray, it makes your carpets look like they did when you first moved in. I can not recommend another carpet cleaner higher. It's super easy to use and gets the job done, and you can't ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.author: Blake DeLugt

customer_reviews.title: Next greatest thing after sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my carpet installers. I never use spray foam any more. Simple directions, wait for it to dry, then vacuum. Stain gone. Odor gone. I have four cats. Cats who yak. Often. I can’t live without Capture!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was truly Amazed how well this product worked.!! I researched several products both steam an Dry Vac and read many Review's and finally decided to go Dry. The Product is wonderful and I will Buy Both again.. I also Purchased the Pre Spot / Stain spray..
customer_reviews.author: ap knodel

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for more years than i can remember. That alone should say enough about Capture Carpet Dry Cleaner Powder. We have a few dogs that are inside dogs and well they have accidents from time to time and this is the only product we use on our carpets and rugs with never an issue. Follow the direction and use the pre mist and all goes well. We shall always have Capture Carpet Dry Cleaner Powder in our homes
customer_reviews.author: Chris NC

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled on this years ago at Home Depot. They nor Lowes carry it anymore. I went without it until the internet came along! I have white Berber carpet, kids, dogs, cats, horses and a husband! I presoak with vinegar and water, use capture and let it work for a few days and vacuum it up! People cannot believe my carpet is 30 years old!! Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did not remove an hour old spot from a doggy accident. Clogged up my vacuum sweeper when attempting to follow instructions. The Capture producer just told me I hadn’t used it properly. I DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Judy and Larry LaBean

customer_reviews.title: Picks up stains other cleaners do not.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Capture for close to 30 years and have found it to be one of the best carpet cleaners overall and for the stains other cleaners to not get out...including machine cleaners. I have also used it on furniture and the car. The dry cleaner in combination with the pre-mist drawers stains and odors out of the carpet and fabrics. Leaves a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans as well as the Oreck cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this cleaner several times now and cleans as well as some More expensive cleaners out there. When used as directed it ultimately soaks up stains and grime as good as anything we’ve used. Some carpets are irreparable, but this cleaner helps prolong the life of our carpets and when used with a soil release spray, it’s helped make our carpets last longer than we expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it not do the job. This stuff was hard to get out of the carpet. I was afraid it would effect our sinuses. I waste of money
customer_reviews.author: gregory guest

customer_reviews.title: As a homeowner I've used Capture for spot and full ...
customer_reviews.text: As a homeowner I've used Capture for spot and full carpet cleaning for over 20 years. It's an incredible product! Any doubts, ask the folks that sold you your carpet their opinion. A word of caution... make sure you have enough vacuum bags on hand before you start. I used three bags this past week when I cleaned our family room carpet. Once a bag gets over 50% full, the suction can go way down and increase your time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: RawsonB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cleaning both carpets and area rugs (especially for ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for cleaning both carpets and area rugs (especially for us, with dogs) and leaving them smelling nice but not too strong a smell. Used with the companion spray. I've been buying it for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner that we have used for many years. It cleans without all the wet mess and preserves your carpet's appearance. It is a fantastic cleaner and I also use it in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Capture on our carpets for many years to clean our carpets of cat hairball stains. For such stains you also need the Capture pre-spray stain remover. The combination of the two cannot be beat for removing stains without damaging the carpet color.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Downward

customer_reviews.title: Clean carpet
customer_reviews.text: Best carpet cleaner there is,don't buy the rest get the Capture the Best!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo much better than wet carpet cleaners. I was skeptical about this at first but now it will be my go-to carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with no bulky equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it years ago and was happy to see it again. It is easy to use and works well. I didn’t realize this particular one didn’t come with the corresponding spray so have since ordered that too.
customer_reviews.author: Sneps

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is fresh. It gets out every stain my kids and grandkids and dog have given me. Sometimes I use the spray, sometimes I don't. I use it on my throw rugs too. The rugs last longer than washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use a good vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not friendly with the vacuum. The powder clogged my vacuum to the point it would not work. Had to take everything apart and what a mess that caused. The scenario just repeated till I had all of the powder up. 3 times to be exact. Maybe a shop vac would be a better way to remove powder
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Impink

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to choke somebody about now!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty much a big container of expensive baking soda. I had high hopes because of the many positive reviews. Boy was I dissapointed! DID NOT clean my carpet in the slightest, made a huge mess, and destroyed a very nice vaccum.
customer_reviews.author: V. Owen

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a number of years now and it has never failed to perform well on my carpet to remove stains and dirt. I always use the Pre-Mist Carpet Pretreatment & Spot Remover first. My carpets are 12 yrs old and look great. I have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not up to ranch challenge
customer_reviews.text: Under normal urban/suburban use this product could be the "bees knees". It does a great job removing odors from the carpet which leave the room smelling fresh. It also lifts light dirt and pet hair. It could be a quick way to refresh a carpet if you didn't have time to do the "steam clean/wait'til it drys" thing. However, it wasn't good at removing stains or ground-in dirt. In our ranch environment it was more of a "refresher" - not a substitute for calling the pro-carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Kara K.

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Capture for 25 years. Absolutely the best ever. Has taken out red clay dirt on carpet, even food coloring from young children decorating Christmas cookies. No long waits for carpet to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Don's think about it ..... just get some.
customer_reviews.text: Great for immediate use as when guests are coming over. Does an outstanding job. My vacuum does not like the powder. I recommend with enthusing results
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D Robison

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Oreck product for several years now. Used this product as an alternative, but to my delight, I would say that this product is as good as if not better than the Oreck product.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Capture for decades and love it! Have tried others, but Capture always out performs all of them!
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well in cleaning carpet stains. Wish they would tone down the scent though - very perfumy.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Using for nearly 25 years!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for nearly 25 years so obviously it works and I like it very much. Use for spills (including red wine), cat hair ball vomits, and for overall refreshing of the entire carpet which has a short pile.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: This takes the stain out
customer_reviews.text: We use this to keep white carpet clean (we bought house with the white carpet--it is not me that is nuts, it was someone else). Does a great job at keeping high traffic areas clean. THis stuff is awesome at stains- dump some of the powder on and scrub it in and wait a little bit and sweep it up. Bad part is, the powder can plug up your sweeper. But it is worth it for a product that can truely take the stain away.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: The best carpet cleaner ever. We use it to clean heavy travelled areas and cat hairballs (a real mess). You just sprinkle it on the carpet, brush it in, and return later to vacuum it. With a good vacuum it leaves no residue. A large pail lasts many months for repeated spot and area cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Capture is Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 20 plus years, I guess. It's my go-to product for all my carpet cleaning needs. It's simply amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Cole

customer_reviews.title: Really "capture" the dirt
customer_reviews.text: I love Capture Deep Cleaning Powder. It is easy to use and very effective. The product is lightly scented but the fragrance disappears almost immediately. I live in a part of the country where the soil is red. So far, Capture has removed all tracked in dirt and mud stains. The only stain that still remains is from a tinted furniture finishing oil. That one won't come out.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: ... release for over 20 years and it cleans carpets better than any steam cleaner I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product with the soil release for over 20 years and it cleans carpets better than any steam cleaner I have used! The spots do not return and I do not have to clean carpet every month like you do with typical steam cleaners that just push the dirt into the pad below for it to return later in the same place. It will even remove red wine and yucky yellow animal throw up!
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: I have a white-ish carpet and dogs.  This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Capture for years, if it's not working you are not doing it right. For tough spots, I have found you might have to go over it a few times, and then let it sit for a day....brush it out, and then vacuum. If I can keep a white carpet white and stainfree with german shepherds in the house.....there should not be much that this stuff doesn't clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest carpets.
customer_reviews.text: Best carpet cleaner ever. Best removed with a shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER FOR CARPET CLEANING
customer_reviews.text: Capture powder is the best cleaner for almost any carpet. Works wonders in my home. Thanks for having it available.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for 20 years and found it the best for any type of rug or carpet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 20 years and found it the best for any type of rug or carpet. I learned about this from a carpet store when they came out to clean my carpets. After you apply and if using with the Capture pre-mist spot remover you need to let the spot dry completely before you vacuum. Works great on wine, food soils, etc. I was glad to see Amazon carried this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Did perhaps better than water extraction on traffic areas
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Its a bit of work but not much. Goof results.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis L. Stavn

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It was recommended when we built our house. It has helped keep the carpet clean, fresh and definitely with the look of wear.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY L HUSA

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for fresh smelling cream carpets with no hassle.  Just vacume.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carpet cleaner. However it takes an expensive machine to do the job. On a good note, I use a scrub brush to clean th hard spots. I like to sprinkle a little in the carpet to keep the fresh smell alo with a good clensong.
customer_reviews.author: James R Cesena

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great for spot cleaning carpet without removing stain repellent property of it.
customer_reviews.author: momobride

customer_reviews.title: Take some effort, real "elbow grease" required, but the results are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean and deodorize area carpets in my home. More effort is required than one might like to get the job done, In the end, the carpets were perfectly clean and the odor is gone. Well worth the effort...
customer_reviews.author: Floyd L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this dry carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Capture for my carpets for years it is so easy to use and I know I have no residue left in my carpet. It is very easy to use and brightens the carpet. I use the Capture spot mister in heavy traffic areas and a little scotch guard as needed. MP
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: This is the absolute best cleaner for hard to remove stains
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best cleaner for hard to remove stains. I actually spray on a liquid cleaner first, agitate the fibers, tap dry with a cloth, then apply the Capture and slightly brush it into the fibers, let it set for a full two hours, then vacuum, and the stains will be gone (unless if this is some type of indelible ink).
customer_reviews.author: Harold J. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Best carpet cleaner - Originally recommended by high end rug store but purchasing on Amazon saved big bucks. This stuff does a great job especially with pet accidents
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see much of a difference, if any, after I used this carpet cleaner. My carpet still looked pretty dingy. My carpet is only 4 years old but it had never been cleaned. It did leave a clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Nigh

customer_reviews.title: Our Carpets Smell and Feel Fresh
customer_reviews.text: This is the best carpet cleaner. Our carpets smell and feel so fresh after using it. It's nice to have as an in between with the deeper carpet cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Does what is says- amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This really is a best kept secret. We have two dogs, one of which is elderly and has bladder control problems. I used this all over regular and berber carpeting and i couldn't believe how my carpets looked brand new, and odors were GONE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stain remover ever when you use it according to the directions. Get it in conjunction with the prespray by Capture and your stain issues are a thing of the past. It works on grape juice and coffee. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: I use the cleaner with a dual brushed Koblez floor cleaner. Does and outstanding job of cleaning the carpet and I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kruth

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best, used for years. dry stain cleanup, never had a stain defeat this stuff. dogs, infants etc.
customer_reviews.author: Albert D.

customer_reviews.title: Superior cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Best carpet cleaner I have ever used. I have been using it over 20 years. I would never force water down into my carpet...WATER + Dirt = MUD! people think they are really cleaning their carpet when the use water extraction. Why does it always look dirtier after you clean it? MUD!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ingermanson

customer_reviews.title: I use it with my Oreck (Orbitor).  It is cheaper than Oreck carpet cleaner and works as well.
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. The carpet looks very nice after using it. It can be messy, but it is worth it. The carpet is dry after using it.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good carpet cleaning product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using capture for many years. It cleans well and does not contain harmful chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We have used Capture carpet cleaner for years and have found it is harder to get and much more expensive, so we bought a large amount. It was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Will get pretty much any stain out of your carpet
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works wonders! Will get pretty much any stain out of your carpet. I always use the pre-mist before sprinkling.
customer_reviews.author: SD Mom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for mebg
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what carpets people were cleaning. My woven wool rug does not look much better than before I used this product. I will NEVER buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Ross

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVED this the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this the first time I used it, but for some treason, this time tho, the powder was very "heavy", almost sticky like. Not sure if maybe I just got a "bad"batch, but it worked sooooooo good the first time, I'm willing to give it one more try and order it again. ;) My first batch was definitely a 5 star i have to give this batch tho, a 3 star. I'll update once I receive my 3rd batch.
customer_reviews.author: Bellabeigh

customer_reviews.title: the spray's didnt come with thw cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It looks like only part of the order got here and part of the order hasnt even been mailed can you check it please
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product; it has always exceeded my expectations. I particularly like the dry powder version of this cleaner. Unbelievable! The transaction, delivery, and payment were easy, prompt, and satisfactory. I would recommend this product and method of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Il cane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 20 something years on my carpet. I have a light cream carpet, and after all this time, it still looks very good. Capture has helped to keep it this way. Love this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne lenz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I love Capture. It works well, and is not as messy as a wet application cleaner. If your carpet is filthy, it will help, but not take out all the stains in one application.
customer_reviews.author: Style Tip Junkie

customer_reviews.title: This was a godsend for using with my new puppy ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a godsend for using with my new puppy, Shepherd/Lab mix. She had a few accidents and after spraying this she no longer even attempted to go pee pee in those spots! "
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Walbaum-Vaniman

customer_reviews.title: Capture carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Doesn't leave moisture in your carpet. Fresh smell.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Russell Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Capture is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Capture is easy to use,no mess and works. Best to use a machine Luke an Oreck Orbiter or similar but a carpet brush will work. Brush it in evenly on carpet let it set for 30 minutes then vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Maxpower

customer_reviews.title: Must Have if you have pets.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. It gets out even the toughest stains. If you have peta you must own this product. If stain doesn't come out first time, try again. It will come out. Also, you may need to use again if you started with a very wet stain.
customer_reviews.author: GoG8rz

customer_reviews.title: I use it with enzyme carpet release spray.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with my oreck orbital floor cleaner machine. I always make sure that I don’t run out. It last a long time but when you get motivated-you gotta have it:)
customer_reviews.author: Larkin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have an almost white carpet and it's the best product I can find and this is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great choice to clean carpet without getting pad underneath wet.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and works well. I did not have any tough stains or spots so I can’t comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zaborske

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Carpet cleaner on the market
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly, very easy to use, the smell is not overpowering and very pleasant
customer_reviews.author: John Arnold

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Capture Dry Carpet cleaner ever since ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Capture Dry Carpet cleaner ever since we had our carpeting installed in April of 1990. I have removed everything from "snake" blook, to blueberry pie filling using it.
customer_reviews.author: connie turner

customer_reviews.title: This stuff rocks have bought it twice now!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaned any and all smells that our dog put into our carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Capture
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs and need to clean my carpets at least every eight weeks or so. This product cleans and eliminates odor.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: NOT A ONE PART ITEM
customer_reviews.text: UPON READING THE DIRECTIONS I FIND OUT THAT THIS IS A TWO PART PRODUCT. IT SHOULD OF BEEN STATED UP FRONT WHEN PURCHASING BUT WASN'T. SO I GIVE IT A ONE STAR RATING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: capture carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Works great. White, barely damp white power. Used this to sprinkle on carpet spots and traffic area by the outside door. Sprinkled it on, brushed in, waited and vacuumed. Must be brushed into carpet. Waited about 30 minutes but probably could have waited less time to vacuum. Unlike wet shampoo, the traffic area stays cleaner for longer. Touch ups are a breeze. Cleaning a whole room might be a chore without some machine to brush in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for minimal stains and normal traffic
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time. Great product for minimal stains and normal traffic.
customer_reviews.author: NatlChamp

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this carpet cleaner for years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this carpet cleaner for years. It has saved my beige carpet from my toddlers. I mean to tell you, EVERY type of stain that we got, it would get rid of. This product is truly magical.
customer_reviews.author: acalderon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Capture for 30 years. It is the best carpet cleaner I have found. It even removed motor oil from a seat in our car. I recommend it to anyone in need of carpet cleaner,
customer_reviews.author: Gary Freel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. When used with the pre mist my carpet still looks new after 20 years
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mullendore

customer_reviews.title: Capture is the best carpet cleaner I have ever used :)
customer_reviews.text: Capture is amazing! Used it in my RV and it worked so well that I bought it to clean my carpets at home. I used it overnight on a very old stain and the carpet looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Geidel

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST !!!I HAVE USED THIS FOR 25 YEARS !! NOTHING CAN COMPARE !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TOODY

customer_reviews.title: Great on rugs
customer_reviews.text: My mother used to use this product and it is an easy way to get all kinds of stains out of carpets. Just spray on the liquid enzymes, sprinkle the powder, brush in and wait 20 minutes to dry then vacuum. Done.
customer_reviews.author: RobertG

customer_reviews.title: Have recommended to several friends and family and they all use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over 20 years, and have yet to find something it can’t get out of my off-white carpet. Have recommended to several friends and family and they all use it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy to use and definitely takes away the dog smell without a heavy perfume scent.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It is just perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I clean my entire carpet and oriental rugs with this powder. It is just perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marliese Bonk

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I like the fact that the carpet dries fast .
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Maynard

product_meta.title: Capture Carpet Dry Cleaner Powder 8 lb - Deodorize Stains Smell Moisture from Rug Furniture Clothes and Fabric, Pet Stains Odor and Smoke Too
feature_bullets: Safe for all types of carpets including Wool and Code S fabric, silk, surfaces and material. Spots do not reappear. Re-sealable lid, easy storage container.
Prolong life of carpet and fabrics. Combine with Capture Pre-Mist for very difficult stains spots and spills. Remover of dirt, odors and moisture from pets, dogs and cats
Absorbent deep cleaning powder: Wet cleaners add moisture to your carpets, rugs, upholstery, furniture, sofa and couch. Capture Powder Cleaner removes the moisture and removes the stains and smells.
Safe in home with kids and pets. Safe for use with all vacuums.
Clean Up To 800 square feet - 8lb Pail Made in the USA.
